data.title: Mass Housing: Modern Architecture and State Power – a Global History 9781474229272, 9781474222501, 9781474229302, 9781474229296
data.meta_description: This major work provides the first comprehensive history of one of modernism’s most defining and controversial architect...

Conclusion

CHAPTER 6 FRANCE: THE ‘TRENTE GLORIEUSES’ OF MASS HOUSING

SCIC, SCET and the état planificateur

1955–75: ‘grands ensembles’ and the industrialization of national grandeur

CHAPTER 10 SOUTHERN EUROPE: SOCIAL HOUSING FOR KINSHIP SOCIETIES
